section.20: The Book on Vows and Oaths

hadiths.text: Narrated Sa'd bin 'Ubaidah:That Ibn 'Umar heard a man saying: "No by the Ka'bah" so Ibn 'Umar said: "Nothing is sworn by other than Allah, for I heard the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) say: 'Whoever swears by other than Allah, he has committed disbelief or shirk
